Are you sure 'cron' is running?  What does ps -AF|grep -i cron return?
Did you keep an eye on /var/log/syslog? Is there any record of cron trying to invoke it?
What user is this running as?  Is there anything in that user's mail file at /var/log/spool/mail?
You do realize that your cron is configured to run the command at 2:19PM local time, right?
